## Adult Artful Hours: Junk Journal Meetup!

This meetup is to provide a space for journalers to work on their own journals alongside others, share ideas, supplies and learn from each other's experiences, all while watching a cozy movie! 

### DATE AND TIME

Tue, January 06, 2026

6:00 PM – 8:30 PM CST

### LOCATION

LHUCA Gallery 

511 Avenue K

LHUCA

Lubbock, Texas 79401

United States

Register

# DETAILS

Whether you've attended a meetup before or are looking for a new hobby for 2026, join us in the LHUCA Galleries to journal and set the mood for the New Year! This meetup is to provide a space for journalers to work on their own journals alongside others, share ideas, supplies and learn from each other's experiences, all while watching a cozy movie! (registration encouraged, ages 16+, journalers are asked to bring their own journal)
